refnamediv.refpurpose: This function returns strongest bounding boxes based on the score of each box

listitem.para: Each row represents one bounding box specified as [x y width height];
method to compute the ratio of the intersection area between two boxes and it is specified as string, possile values are 'Union', 'Min'. Default-Union
It specifies maximum overlap ratio, if overlap ration is more than this corresponding bounding box will be removed, possible range is 0 to 1. Default-0.5

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: If the ratio type is union, ratio is computed as area of intersection divided by area of union of two bounding boxes. If the ratio type is min, ratio is computed as area of intersection divided minimum area of the two bounding boxes.

It selects strongest bounding boxes based on their scores and the given RatioType, OverlapThreshold. It returns selected boxes and their correspondoing scores, additionally it returns the index of the selected boxes if 3 output arguments are specified
